casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jessie HAYES, Defendant-Appellant. People of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Donyelle Michael Black, Defendant-Appellant. People of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jemal Tipton, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157813
COA: 339543
SC: 157814
COA: 339544
SC: 157815
COA: 339547 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 22, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer to the applications for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before July 17, 2018.
